Title: KIRKS FOLLY SIGNED/RARE/RETIRED "GORGEOUS SEA QUEEN MERMAID BROOCH" W/DOLPHINS!
Description: NEW KIRKS FOLLY...RARE/RETIRED/SIGNED/STUNNING "SEA QUEEN MERMAID W/WINGS BROOCH" ...What a perfect Kirks Folly brooch to start your own collection! This is a wonderful and oh so beautiful piece for the serious Mermaid or Sea Creatures lover or collector! She measures 3-3/4" long by 1-1/2" and she is signed on the back. Her Mermaid tail is filled with purple aurora borealis stones and the Conch shell she is holding has stones too. In her hair are two purple flowers accented with more stones. Her wings are a combination of green and purple and the two dolphins are hand enameled. Absolutely stunning sea creature! She is beautiful!!!
